Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/44th
ShortDescription: Northbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 47th, Pulaski, 31st and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/44th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 47th, Pulaski, 31st and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/44th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
